comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content:
Isn't it a remarkable photograph?  
Privilege, position, power, personality, perfectly posed, peerlessly photographed, posterity perpetuated! 
(that was a struggle!!!)
It is a really interesting photograph of a different era and a remarkable family.  The family resemblances are distinctive, the elegance is definitive but the groom looks less than enthusiastic.  Quite a lot of leg on display for that era, rather risque?

comment.author: 41771725@N06
comment._content: Bellísima fotografía de tiempos pasados, la composición y pose de los personajes soberbia!!!!Excelente el comentario de swordscookie!

comment.author: 77603809@N02
comment._content: It was the jazz age, and a glimpse of stocking was no longer shocking...evidently even in Waterford, at least among the swells.
